Thanks for answering!

The CSS is generated on server side.
   For exampl=
e www.veere.nl. After crawling everithing is ok exсept background pic=
tures. When you choose some link at menu bar, the background also changes, =
at crawled site background is always the same.

--- In archive-crawler@yaho=
ogroups.com, Noah Levitt <nlevitt@...> wrote:
>
> Hello,
> 
> I'm not sure =
what you mean by dynamic css. My guess would be css that's generated dynami=
cally on the server side, in which case that shouldn't present special prob=
lems for crawling. Heritrix does extract links from css. If you mean css ge=
nerated dynamically on the client side using javascript, then that's tricki=
er. Heritrix does its best to guess urls from javascript strings, but that =
link extraction can easily be foiled. Can you explain the problem further, =
perhaps with example urls?
> 
> Noah
> 
> On 2011-08-09 04:27 , mike.pavlen=
ko wrote:
> > I'm using heritrix-1.14.4 and there are 3 different sites wit=
h dynamic CSS. Also I use wayback 1.4.2 and 1.6 for displaying my warcs.
> =
>   Does heritrix support dynamic css extractor, if yes, how should it be c=
onfigured.
> >
> > P.S. I tried it at different PCs and don't know if herit=
rix support such thing.
